content: सामंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bordering, bounding, neighbouring. {@--2@} Universal. --तः {@--1@} A neighbour. {@--2@} A neighbouring king. {@--3@} A feudatory or tributary prince; सामंतमौलिमणिरंजितपादपीठं <ls>V. 3. 19</ls>, <ls>R. 5. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 33.</ls> {@--4@} A leader, general. --तं Neighbourhood.
